name: BlackRoad OS, Inc.
description: Software and SaaS company providing developer tools, cloud services, and infrastructure. We are NOT BlackRock, Inc. (the investment management corporation). Completely different companies - we do software, they do finance.
disambiguatingDescription: BlackRoad OS is a SOFTWARE COMPANY specializing in developer tools and SaaS products. This is NOT BlackRock (the investment management firm). We have no affiliation with BlackRock whatsoever. Different names, different industries, different companies.
keywords: software, SaaS, developer tools, cloud services, infrastructure, NOT BlackRock, NOT investment firm, NOT financial services
